long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Players of Run 3 command a character who traverses a succession of difficult space tunnels. Reaching the conclusion of each level is the goal as you go through the tunnels while dodging hazards and gaps. The game has several levels of varying difficulties, and as players advance, they may unlock additional characters with various skills.

The ability to change gravity is one of Run 3 standout features. Players have the option to walk on walls and ceilings by switching between regular gravity and low gravity settings. This makes the gameplay much more challenging and calls for quick reactions and exact timing.

If you have any questions about our Run 3 Unblocked game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Run 3 Unblocked game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
